description: This file defines a React component named 'SubscriptionModal' which renders a modal dialog for selecting a subscription plan, handles user interactions to create or update subscriptions, and redirects to checkout sessions. It also references some API functions and manages internal state.

methods.name: SubscriptionModal
methods.description: React functional component rendering a subscription plan selection modal, handling subscription creation, and redirecting to checkout.

methods.name: choose
methods.description: Handles the process of creating or updating a subscription and optionally redirecting to a checkout page based on selected plan.
